slides.title: Mission
slides.content: The UPRM SuMAS Summer Internship mission is to improve the participating students’ knowledge, skills and abilities in Sustainable Management of Agricultural Systems (SuMAS) in Puerto Rico through workshops, team discussions, research, and projects.

slides.title: Vision
slides.content: The UPRM SuMAS Summer Internship vision is to increase professional and academic readiness of UPRM Hispanic undergraduate students in agriculture, and broaden their awareness and knowledge about Sustainable Management of Agricultural Systems (SuMAS) and  Sustainable Agricultural Intensification (SAI) practices to better serve Puerto Rico’s local and the national agriculture and food system needs.
